title: 客户公司与国家
description: 列出所有客户的公司名与国家
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT company_name, country FROM customers ORDER BY company_name
hints: 基本筛选;按公司名排序

title: 德国客户数量
description: 统计来自德国的客户数量
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customers WHERE country = 'Germany'
hints: COUNT 聚合;简单条件过滤

title: 最贵商品前五
description: 列出单价最高的前5个商品及单价
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 5

title: 缺货商品
description: 列出库存为0的商品
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE units_in_stock = 0 ORDER BY product_id

title: 饮料类商品
description: 列出类别为“Beverages”的所有商品
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Beverages' ORDER BY p.product_id

title: 发往国家列表
description: 列出订单中所有不同的发货国家
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT DISTINCT ship_country FROM orders ORDER BY ship_country

title: 每类商品数量
description: 统计每个类别下的商品数量
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY c.category_name ORDER BY product_count DESC

title: 1997年订单数
description: 统计1997年创建的订单数量
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders WHERE YEAR(order_date) = 1997

title: 客户数最多的国家TOP5
description: 按国家统计客户数量并取前5
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS customer_count FROM customers GROUP BY country ORDER BY customer_count DESC, country ASC LIMIT 5

title: 高运费订单
description: 列出运费大于100的订单号与运费
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT order_id, freight FROM orders WHERE freight > 100 ORDER BY freight DESC, order_id ASC
hints: 比较运算;多关键字排序

title: 客户订单数量TOP10
description: 统计每个客户的订单数量并取前10
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name ORDER BY order_count DESC, c.customer_id ASC LIMIT 10

title: 员工处理订单数
description: 统计每位员工处理的订单数量
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT e.employee_id, e.last_name, e.first_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM employees e LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY e.employee_id, e.last_name, e.first_name ORDER BY order_count DESC, e.employee_id ASC

title: 商品销售额TOP10
description: 按订单明细计算每个商品的总销售额并取前10
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, SUM(od.unit_price * od.quantity * (1 - od.discount)) AS total_sales FROM products p JOIN order_details od ON od.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10

title: 各国平均发货延迟
description: 计算各发货国家平均发货延迟(天)
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT ship_country, AVG(DATEDIFF(shipped_date, order_date)) AS avg_delay_days FROM orders WHERE shipped_date IS NOT NULL AND order_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ship_country ORDER BY avg_delay_days DESC

title: 年度订单数
description: 统计每年订单数量
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT YEAR(order_date) AS year, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY YEAR(order_date) ORDER BY year

title: 从未被订购的商品
description: 找出从未出现在订单明细里的商品
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name FROM products p LEFT JOIN order_details od ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.product_id IS NULL ORDER BY p.product_id

title: 类别平均单价
description: 计算每个类别的平均商品单价
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT c.category_name, AVG(p.unit_price) AS avg_price FROM products p JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = p.category_id GROUP BY c.category_name ORDER BY avg_price DESC

title: 折扣订单占比
description: 统计有折扣(>0)的订单数量及占比
reference_sql_mysql: WITH a AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) AS total_orders FROM order_details), b AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) AS discounted_order_count FROM order_details WHERE discount > 0) SELECT b.discounted_order_count, ROUND(100.0 * b.discounted_order_count / NULLIF(a.total_orders,0), 2) AS percentage FROM a, b

title: 客户最近下单日期
description: 查询每位客户最近一次下单日期
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name ORDER BY last_order_date DESC

title: 供应商销售额TOP5
description: 统计各供应商的总销售额并取前5
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT s.supplier_id, s.company_name, SUM(od.unit_price * od.quantity * (1 - od.discount)) AS total_sales FROM suppliers s JOIN products p ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN order_details od ON od.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id, s.company_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5

title: 各国内客户销售额排名TOP3
description: 每个国家内按客户总销售额排名取前3
reference_sql_mysql: WITH sales AS ( SELECT c.country, c.customer_id, c.company_name, SUM(od.unit_price * od.quantity * (1 - od.discount)) AS total_sales FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN order_details od ON od.order_id = o.order_id GROUP BY c.country, c.customer_id, c.company_name ), ranked AS ( SELECT country, customer_id, company_name, total_sales, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY country ORDER BY total_sales DESC) AS rnk FROM sales ) SELECT country, customer_id, company_name, total_sales, rnk AS rank FROM ranked WHERE total_sales IS NOT NULL AND rnk <= 3
hints: 窗口函数 RANK;分组排名

title: 月度订单移动平均
description: 计算每月订单数及3个月移动平均
reference_sql_mysql: WITH m AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_date, '%Y-%m-01') AS month, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY 1 ) SELECT month, order_count, ROUND(AVG(order_count) OVER (ORDER BY month ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW),2) AS ma3 FROM m ORDER BY month

title: 发货超10天订单占比(年)
description: 按年份计算发货延迟>10天的订单占比
reference_sql_mysql: WITH base AS ( SELECT YEAR(order_date) AS year, COUNT(*) AS total_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN shipped_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(shipped_date, order_date) > 10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS late_cnt FROM orders WHERE order_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1 ) SELECT year, ROUND(100.0 * late_cnt / NULLIF(total_cnt,0),2) AS late_ratio FROM base ORDER BY year

title: 一年未复购客户
description: 识别距离全局最近下单日期超过一年未下单的客户
reference_sql_mysql: WITH latest AS (SELECT MAX(order_date) AS max_date FROM orders), cust AS ( SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order_date FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.company_name ) SELECT customer_id, company_name, last_order_date FROM cust, latest WHERE last_order_date IS NOT NULL AND last_order_date < DATE_SUB(latest.max_date, INTERVAL 365 DAY) ORDER BY last_order_date

title: 员工累计订单数
description: 按时间为每位员工计算累计订单数
reference_sql_mysql: WITH eo AS ( SELECT employee_id, order_date, COUNT(*) AS order_cnt FROM orders WHERE employee_id IS NOT NULL AND order_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY employee_id, order_date ) SELECT employee_id, order_date, SUM(order_cnt) OVER (PARTITION BY employee_id ORDER BY order_date ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) AS order_count_running FROM eo ORDER BY employee_id, order_date

title: 类别内高于全局均价的商品
description: 列出单价高于全局平均单价的商品
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.unit_price, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE p.unit_price > (SELECT AVG(unit_price) FROM products) ORDER BY p.unit_price DESC

title: 区域与订单统计
description: 统计每个大区的员工人数与订单数量
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT r.region_description, COUNT(DISTINCT e.employee_id) AS employee_count, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM region r JOIN territories t ON t.region_id = r.region_id JOIN employee_territories et ON et.territory_id = t.territory_id JOIN employees e ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY r.region_description ORDER BY employee_count DESC

title: 客户平均复购间隔
description: 计算每位客户相邻两单的平均间隔天数
reference_sql_mysql: WITH o AS ( SELECT c.customer_id, c.company_name, o.order_date, LAG(o.order_date) OVER (PARTITION BY c.customer_id ORDER BY o.order_date) AS prev_order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id ), d AS ( SELECT customer_id, company_name, DATEDIFF(order_date, prev_order_date) AS gap_days FROM o WHERE prev_order_date IS NOT NULL ) SELECT customer_id, company_name, ROUND(AVG(gap_days),2) AS avg_gap_days FROM d GROUP BY customer_id, company_name ORDER BY avg_gap_days

title: 高频共购商品对TOP10
description: 找出同一订单中最常一起出现的商品对
reference_sql_mysql: SELECT od1.product_id AS product_id_a, od2.product_id AS product_id_b, COUNT(*) AS together_count FROM order_details od1 JOIN order_details od2 ON od1.order_id = od2.order_id AND od1.product_id < od2.product_id GROUP BY od1.product_id, od2.product_id ORDER BY together_count DESC LIMIT 10

title: 每月新客户数
description: 统计每月的首单客户数量
reference_sql_mysql: WITH first_orders AS ( SELECT o.customer_id, MIN(o.order_date) AS first_order_date FROM orders o GROUP BY o.customer_id ), m AS ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(first_order_date, '%Y-%m-01') AS month, COUNT(*) AS new_customers FROM first_orders GROUP BY 1 ) SELECT month, new_customers FROM m ORDER BY month
